captions.text: Whoa...
Ahhhh, Oh my gosh! Get em off me! ughhhh

Ahhh what was i thinking??
This room is full of spiders!

Why did I ever come in here??
AHHHHH!

So, Peter, in conclusion.
Responsibility and choice and importance and
things and stuff...
You understand what Im saying?
Are you saying with great power comes great responsibility?
Yes! Thats it, thats it exactly!

Thank you, I couldn't have said it better
myself.
Good job.
Good , good talk, Pete.
Somebody go get me some eggs already!!!!

You saved my boy.
Thank you!
Who are you?
Im Spider-man

So you gonna go down there and save those
other cars now?

Im actually kind of busy all of a sudden.
But Im sure they'll be fine.

Well that completes the animation of my evil
plan.

I will now set it to loop in case anyone should
stumble by and is curious about what this is all about.
Whispers..
What was that?
Whispers..
OOH you're right

I probably shouldn't leave this thing running
for everyone to see..

Thanks little friend!
Im glad there are hundreds of you following
me around to tell me these things.

Wow this is incredibly perfect how all these
cranes are lined up for me!
Haha!

I couldn't have asked for a better situ--
OH NO!!
I ran out of web!
AHHHHHHHHH!!!
(Crash)
Just promise me one thing..
Leave Gwyn out of it..
So that she'll be safe.
Ok..
I promise.
Don't make promises you can't keep.
Yea but those are the best kind.
WHAT?!?!?!
You did not say that...
HAHAHAHAHA!
Why are you guy sloughing?
Oh man...
(Chuckling)
Stop laughing at me!
Ok, I promise I won't laugh!
Don't make promises you can't keep!
Why, those are the best kinds?!!
Hahahaha

Man, if that were true, anyone could get away
with anything.
I know, right?

You guys.. I was trying to be sweet for my
girlfriend..

Yea, after you made her suffer through her
fathers' death all alone.
Yea you're in the doghouse, dude.
Yea, but she'll get over it right?
Ummmmmm.. Sure
Good luck.
Aw man..
You know what I would have done?
Thrown a bat-a-rang at him?

Probably, but I would have also used that
antidote immediately on Dr. Connors when he
was temporarily frozen.
Then Gwyn's dad doesn't have to die at all.

But what about all the other cops that were
turning into lizards?

Well they would change back to humans after
one day, right?
Oh..

You also had that lizard formula in your hands
before Captain Stacy died..
Why not give him a little dose?

Maybe its regenerative powers would heal his
wounds?

Wow, I did not think about that. You are totally
right.
Well, Im Batman.

I would have just reversed time and saved
everyone.
I can't believe this. Im so embarrassed.
Don't worry, kid. It could have been worse.
It could have been a lot worse.
What the..? Who the heck trashed up my library?
Was it you?

Stark? Thor? Hulk? I'll bet it was you, wasn't
it?
Wehh, we arent even in this story Generalisimo.
Ive got my eye on you.....
Music...
Hey guys, hope you enjoyed the video.

Thank you so much to everyone who left comments
to help write the script. And even bigger
thank you goes to the one and only, Stan Lee.

Please help us to say thank you by subscribing
to his channels, Stan Lee's World of Heroes.

They were so awesome to want to part of this
project and we think you guys would love what
they're doing over there. So go check em out.

Ok, well thank you so much for watching 
and um
(Crying) But I don't understand! You sit in the cafe, cool web chairs and the real Stan Lee and the hot blonde..
Its not fair!! (Crying)

Ok... well Im gonna deal with this guy and you
guys have a good week.
See ya!
